Configuring the PPTP Server

To configure the PPTP VPN server:

 1. Choose VPN > PPTP Server.

 2. In the PPTP Server Configuration section, configure the PPTP VPN settings:

a. Check the PPTP Server Enable check box.

b. Enter the IP address of the PPTP server.

c. Enter the range of IP addresses for PPTP clients.

d. To encrypt the data passing through the PPTP VPN connection, check the MPPE Encryption Enable check box.

 3. Click Save.
